abstract.t: This document describes an encapsulation method for transportingService Data Units (SDUs) of different protocols over a single LabelSwitched Path (LSP). The different protocols are identified by pre-pending an LLC / SNAP header to the SDU. The method allowsinterconnecting networks with a different layer 2 protocol via anintermediate MPLS network. The proposed encapsulation method iscomplementary to PWE3.
